trans-unit.source: Serializes a connector layout.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This class is also useful for customizing the serialization of connectors of classes derived from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]이 클래스 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> 에서 파생 된 클래스의 커넥터 serialization을 사용자 지정 하는 데 도움이 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorLayoutSerializer"></xref> class.
Creates an instance of the specified <xref:System.Type> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 인스턴스를 만들고 <xref:System.Type>사용 하 여 지정 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> supporting this operation.
The specified <xref:System.Type>.
An instance of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
type is a null reference ().

Gets a Dictionary collection filled with element name and their associated values from the current position in the xml reader associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 요소 이름 및 연결 된 xml 판독기의 현재 위치에서 연결 된 값으로 채워진 Dictionary 컬렉션과 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
The specified <xref:System.Type>.
Dictionary based collection containing the argument names and their associated values for the construction of the connector.
trans-unit.target: 사전 기반 인수 이름 및 커넥터 생성에 대 한 연결 된 값을 포함 하는 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves information about all properties associated with the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 개체와 연결 된 모든 속성에 대 한 정보를 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
The <xref:System.Object> to search for properties.
A array that contains information about the properties associated with obj.
trans-unit.target: A 와 연결 된 속성에 대 한 정보가 포함 된 배열 obj .

trans-unit.source: serializationManager or obj contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: serializationManager또는 obj 에 null 참조 ( Visual basic에서).

trans-unit.source: Performs processing of the object after the deserialization process.
trans-unit.target: Deserialization 프로세스 이후 개체의 처리를 수행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
The <xref:System.Object> that was deserialized.
